title: Predicting E-commerce Purchase Behavior using a DQN-Inspired Deep Learning Model for enhanced adaptability
summary: This paper presents a novel approach to predicting buying intent and product demand in e-commerce settings, leveraging a Deep Q-Network (DQN) inspired architecture. In the rapidly evolving landscape of online retail, accurate prediction of user behavior is crucial for optimizing inventory management, personalizing user experiences, and maximizing sales.
